name: 3D Game - sprint03project
description: Utilizing the sprint 2 project, I have improved my sprit 3 project. I have made different objects and animations, so the user can be able to paint. Using the speed and type button, the user can change the speed of the animation and the randomization of the animation. Additionally, by pressing the 1,2,3 computer key user can change Scale, Rotation, and Position. Using the slider or toggle button, the user can choose speed and paint.
